overview: Boh Siaw (Yadi Sembako) interrupts the kungfu teacher Boh Lam’s (Olga Syahputra) and Mey Mey’s (Jessica Iskandar) love story. Boh Siaw is the first brother in Singa Putih Kung Fu Institute. When Boh Siaw takes Ang Pao (Daus Mini) to retrieve a magic book in the jungle, Baron, also known as Amsyong Lu (Rizky Putra), attacks the institute and kidnaps Mey Mey. In the middle of their journey, Boh Siaw and Ang Pao have an accident and die. But they have sworn to save Mey Mey so both rise from the grave.  As pocong, they wander until they find her and defeat Amsyong Lu.
tagline: KATA ORANG LEBIH DAHSYAT DARI SI PANDA?
title: Kungfu Pocong Perawan
